title: Website broken?
body:
Hey guys.

Just asking if the League of legends website appears broken to you guys. For me, the quick navigation bar at the top of the page is gone, which stops me from logging in and quickly accessing the boards after seeing what's new on League. I have to actually Google the website for the boards to get to them.

EDIT: Thanks for all your replies for solutions guys. The problems seem to have fixed themselves after a while, which is strange.

replies.body: Everything fine for me......Maybe just wait a while, and it'll fix itself

Okay... But i'm not sure. It's been like this for a week. Also, I can't access the store in my client and the main "news page" in the client doesn't load either so I'm about to file a support ticket.

EDIT: Lol you were right. Just noticed it fixed itself today xD
It does that when I'm using my Uni's Wifi so it could have something to do with the restrictions on the internet you're connected to.
I was just using my home internet, and also I'm the "main admin" for our home group so I don't have any restrictions or anything. Thanks for the suggestions tho.
Might be a browser issue? Have you tried using a different browser, or clearing your history? Always a good place to start.
Tried that, didn't work. It's all g tho now. Seems to have fixed itself.
